name: girls pizza fundraiser!!!!!!
description:
hi its princess from girlsoft! the foodstamps people fucked up, and also our precious angel dog has an unexpected vet appointment tomorrow for her bad hip. we'll be ok but theres 4 girls living here and we dont know how soon the new snap card will come in the mail (up to 10 more days?) so we're a little hungry lol. a pizza party would keep us extra strong and healthy for at least a few days while we deal with stuff. plus it would be fun and cute 🍕

this is a limited time bundle where u can get our games Celestial Hacker Girl Jessica + Bomb Dolls and my albums frogsongs + amethyst all for $5, or more if u feel like donating more. anything u give us we will spend on food. (please note that your purchase will not unlock the unique itch.io pages for the individual games and albums, nor will it include any steam or bandcamp keys; you'll be receiving downloads from this bundle only.)

UPDATE:

thank you so much everyone omg ;-; <33333
